tool_description: An API that provides information about credit card sign-up bonuses, spend categories, redemption categories, rewards, benefits, card images and much more!
title: Rewards Credit Card API

api_list.name: Spend Bonus Category List
api_list.description: This pulls a list of all spend bonus categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com/creditcard-spendbonuscategory-categorylist"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Credit Card Image
api_list.description: This pulls the card image URL for single credit card
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com/creditcard-card-image/{cardkey}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Transfer Program List
api_list.description: This pulls a list of all travel programs that points can be transfered to from a bank points program (e.g American Express Membership Rewards)

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rewards-credit-card-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
